Pre-Game Insights: Houston Rockets forward Amen Thompson has been a key player since his return from suspension, contributing with 20 points and 15 boards in his last two games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Amen Thompson's presence has improved the Rockets' offensive pace and benefited star guard Jalen Green, who has scored 29+ points in both games since Thompson's return.
Others: LeBron James praised Thompson's athleticism, highlighting the Rockets' improved performance.
